ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&CAUSE& ASObject Semaphore can't be get within specified time (get a timeout). this probably means that there is too much task requesting semaphore at the same time U1&SYSTEM_RESPONSE& ASThe task has finish his job and can't no longer get work to do. Task will stop. U1&WHAT_TO_DO& ASIf you think that task shouldn't stop, change either : B1Bloc size B1Maximum Batch size B1Thread number ASTo prevent in the future any task shutdown U1&SYS_ADMIN& ASKeep in mind that the task has stopped normally no recovery is needed.
